abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO.   60             INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN JOE VACCARO An ordinance submitting to the qualified voters of the City of St. Louis a proposed amendment to the Revised of the City of St. Louis by repealing existing Section 8.02.170 of the Revised Code of the City of St. Louis and enacting a new Section 8.02.170 of the Revised Code of the City of St. Louis relating to Penalty for delinquent filing; providing for an election to be held therefore and the manner of voting thereat; and containing an emergency clause.
